repo.question: Select the statement that best describes the parity method of error detection:

a.choice: Parity checking is best suited for detecting double-bit errors that occur during the transmission of codes from one location to another.

b.choice: Parity checking is not suitable for detecting single-bit errors in transmitted codes.

c.choice: Parity checking is best suited for detecting single-bit errors in transmitted codes.

d.choice: Parity checking is capable of detecting and correcting errors in transmitted codes
